alert.note: Alert for Lucas; Wood (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 18 at 12:04PM EST until February 20 at 8:30PM EST by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Ohio... Maumee River At Waterville affecting Wood and Lucas Counties. For the Maumee River...including Grand Rapids, Waterville...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING TO SUNDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Maumee River At Waterville. * WHEN...From this evening to Sunday evening. * IMPACTS...At 11.0 feet, A few riverside cabins in Waterville become threatened. Lowland flooding occurs along with some water inundation on River Road. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:00 AM EST Friday the stage was 9.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this evening to a crest of 11.5 feet tomorrow evening. It will then fall below flood stage early Sunday afternoon. - Flood stage is 11.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 11.5 feet on 03/14/1962. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this evening by 1015 PM EST.
